> <OLD>
>
> Rat Trap squeaks out of surprise, but then realizes that the bo=
dy is
lifeless. Heaving a sigh of relief, he takes a moment to scan the are=
a, and
sniff the air. It wreaked of enemy signatures.
>
> "I don't like thi=
s.. Night Shift, we got definite Minion and Insecticon
signatures all aroun=
d this place. I got a feel'n that if we're gonna get
Cheetor outa here, we'=
re gonna need some backup."
>
> He sends the feed back to Night Shift.

<NE=
W>

As the duo watches the feed the explosions begin to come faster and mor=
e
furious as the battle intensifies! You have mechanized insects of all sor=
ts
in the air and on the ground, everything from armored bees performing
st=
affing runs firing stinger missiles and laser blasts.

You also have what a=
ppear to be armored lady bugs! However instead of
fighting they appear to b=
e hovering at strategic points, observing the
battle and directing matters.=
 Occasionally they fire blasts at the ground,
targeting the enemy.

Armored=
 Locusts  and rhinoceros beetles are on the ground, in battle against
the i=
nsectile hordes, the smoke from their weapons and the wreckage they are
lea=
ving behind rising into the air.

There are many Stag Beetles also on the g=
round, weaving in among the battle,
sneaking in to attack their foes from b=
ehind and then sneaking back out.

All of these metal formed insects, insec=
ticons if you will, have a definite
MINION registration. However there are =
also the insectile creatures who they
are fighting against who are also put=
ting up a good fight, as the wreckage
of Insecticons as well as Insectile a=
liens liter the landscape.

In the middle of this, almost dead center the q=
ueen of the Insectile
creature stands, still in battle with the great multi=
-headed dragon.

(OOC: Anyone who was there at the old Maximal base may rem=
ember him as
Marauder, the minion who hovered over the base and demanded th=
e release of
Lamia I think it was.)

=93Fool!=94 The dragon said as it swun=
g around for an attack on the queen, =93You
cannot hope to defeat us, you c=
an only hope that we will let you live and
serve US!=94

The queen, who loo=
ks to be some horrid combination of wasp, preying mantis
and wasp, but with=
 the size of an 18 wheeler sweeps into the air! As she
rose she filled the =
air with the sound of her wings. =93All will fall before
the horde.=94 She =
said and them opened her mandible and sent forth a
destructive beam from he=
r jaws!

Marauder swung to the side, allowing his armored frame to take the=
 brunt of
the blast! While there were light scorch marks, he seemed to be l=
ightly
hurt.

=93Is that all you have?!?=94 He laughed as he swung around s=
hifting forms from
his dragon mode into what looked to be an aerial fighter=
 craft, =93Then you
don=92t have what it takes!=94

He fired a blast that c=
aught her in the abdomen, creating a burning wound
along its side!
Her wing=
s fluttered for a moment before she swunf wide to come around on the
sudden=
ly far more agile Marauder.

> <OLD>
>
> "Gotchya, woah, you're right. It m=
ight take more than just us ta get 'em
outa here. I'm gonna try'n connect w=
ith Rodimus but I'm not so sure we're in
range."
>
> He stays in vehicle fo=
rm, and tries his long range radio system, to
contact Rodimus.
>
> "Night S=
hift ta Rodimus, over. Rat Trap and I are on a rescue mission, ta
find Chee=
tor, and now, we got multiple Minion and Decepticon signatures
runn'n rampa=
nt and there's only two of us here. I can transmit our exact
location right=
 now, and hopefully you'll be able ta send some bots out here
ta give us a =
hand. Night Shift over 'n out."

<NEW>

Rodimus responds back to Night Shif=
t, =93Most of our units are in stasis.=94 His
voice was calm and thoughtful=
. =93Have you actually seen Cheetor yet? We don=92t
want to commit our forc=
es until we are sure.=94

At the same time as Nightshift sent his transmiss=
ion several Insecticon
types seem to perk up as if something had caught the=
re attention! As Rodimus
responded to Nightshift, two of them came flying o=
ver in his direction =96
they looked like large and metal armored lady bugs=
!

(TAG)

Preston
